website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for toddlers, this boot is recognized for its durable construction and clever features.
pros: Sole is constructed with durable rubber
Tightening band around calf keeps snow out of boot
cons: Velcro strap should be longer for tighter fits
Not as water resistant as one might expect

customer_reviews.title: Need better closure
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the closure. First of all, if something has a velcro closure, the velcro should extend the entire length of the strap to allow for the ability to adjust tightness as much as possible. When pulling the straps as tightly as I would like them, there is only a small part of the velcro that overlaps to secure them (picture #1). Most of the velcro is not used which means that snow collects in the velcro which eventually loosens the part that is velcroed together. An elastic adjustable drawcord would be much more effective (picture #2).
customer_reviews.author: kmk

customer_reviews.title: Love these new boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughter and she is only 3 and loved them. They are easy to put on and take off. I like the tennis shoe look myself. Im just hoping the warmth is good in them and they stay dry. I always spray a water repellent on them it not only helps the rain but also helps them last longer.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit...at all.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the fact that these boots were made for toddlers (of whom still have somewhat round feet), I was surprised by the decision to make these boots the way they did. I could not get my son's foot all the way down into the shoe, no matter how I tried. His heel just wouldn't reach the bottom. If the makers of this boot allowed for the boot to be zipped closed or something like that, it might have been easier to get his food in them. So, if your toddler has wide feet and/or their feet are still round in any way, DO NOT buy these.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeGrad08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend doesn’t keep feet dry and warm
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE My son wore these outside in his stroller for two hours. When he retired home his feet were cold & wet. I wouldn’t recommend. Or perhaps these have a defect and I should have purchased directly from stride rite. Anyways I’m returnjng them. PAST review I brought these for my one yr old son. He’s about 3.5/4. I brought the 4. They fit great. They are light weight and fashionable. he literally jumps around and plays in the rain puddles. I highly recommend these. My only regret is not buying another color but I will 🤗
customer_reviews.author: FABULOUS FEMALE

customer_reviews.title: You wronged me Stride Rite...for once.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of winter shoes for my little one so I went with Stride Rite, why? Why not?!? They make amazing baby/toddler shoes and he loves his other pairs. Well, these shoes were a bit of a disappointment. Granted the reviews warned me but I guess I was hoping they would be wrong lol. It was easy enough to get on and off but they aren't waterproof and they have zero traction. Get ready for your munchkin to slip and slide. I'm glad he only needed it a couple times or I would be a lot unhappier having to buy another pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Chunli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots, except they run at least a size small.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these boots 5 stars but my son was just measured at Stride Rite and came in under a size 4, so I ordered up to a 4.5. Well, he just fits in them and without socks! I had to exchanged with Amazon and sized up to a 5.5M. Other than them running small, I love that you can roll the shaft down to make it easier to get the boot on. The shaft is nicely lined too and will keep the babe warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: jennypah2c

customer_reviews.title: Good for an unstable runner.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. My kid can run in them, which is a big deal. He is two, and just started really running. I was looking of a boot he could wear this winter that was more than a tennis shoe, but less than an actual snow boot that he could kick a round in for the WA winter. These fit the bill. Plus when I opened the box, he fell in love, eventhough he has never seen star wars. (They were the cheapest in his size).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are awesome, so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome, so worth the money. They are comfortable for my daughter to wear and she can still run and play in them, instead of clunking around in traditional snow boots. And best of all...she can put them on by herself!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: The envy of daycare
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome boots. I’ve been asked by every mom and teacher at daycare where I got them. They are fleece lined, so very warm. I ordered size 4 for my toddler and they fit her true to size. She is just toddling too, and these were easy for her to walk in (yay for striderite). Spoiler alert: these show twilight with wings, and we hadn’t gotten that far in the series yet, so my 3 year old was confused. Luckily we hit that episode fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mira888

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Get on
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. I bough these for my son who was an early walker (9 mths) and had smaller feet. These are incredibly difficult to get on and we tried 3 different sizes, up to 1.5 sizes larger than his normal shoes. It took about 10-15 minutes to finally get them on and I will say my son had an easy time moving in them and his feet stayed dry however it's just not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyV123

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to put on but not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very convenient to put on and take off (you just fold the top part over), and i loved the fact that i could just throw them in the washing machine. However, please dont buy these as your child's only pair of winter boots as they are not waterproof at all and will not work for playing in the snow. Even when i rubbed them with a moist towel to get the dirt off, they were soaked on the inside! So my daughter just wore them when we knew she wouldnt have to walk outside for long- quick car trip to the store or to grandparents' house.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boots.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my 1 year old. She just started walking and can walk in the snow with them easily. I searched for weeks for winter boots that were small enough to fit her. She obviously doesn't go outside in the snow for very long, but they have held up for about 45 minutes without getting her feet wet. She's worn them with just socks, and her feet were perfectly warm when we came inside after playing in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Wet Feet
customer_reviews.text: Our child had similar model last year and we had great success. Unfortunately, this model does not repel moisture. After 2 hours of playing in the snow feet were soaking wet. Boots were tucked into snowpants so the snow was not entering from the top, just the bottom section of the shoe. Socks/feet were wet on the bottom and tops were dry. Too late to return as used (and now, fortunately, end of the snow season), but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kid is happy, mom is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily we haven't had a ton of snow yet this year, but these are great for my toddler to run around in the snow patches + ice. The sneaker feel allows her to be more flexible than most snow boots would, and her feet are staying warm than they do in her fake uggs. I think they may be a bit small, but I know not to argue with my 3 year old after trying 3 different pairs of boots this winter. She's happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Easy for big kids / Impossible to get onto toddler
customer_reviews.text: We used them with my big kid starting at size 6.5. Love them still now that she is in a 12. They are so very easy to get on and off and her feet stay warm. So I felt confident getting a 5 for my toddler but man they are impossible to get on his feet. His little pudding legs and his inability to follow direction are making it a huge chore.
customer_reviews.author: SWR

customer_reviews.title: great mobility. not clunky.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, i wish the velcro could wrap tighter. these are great because they are not bulky like most winter boots. My two complains would be that they are not very warm inside and the material on top of the toes will seep moisture if in the snow for awhile. so maybe this is just maybe something good for a cold day, and not a snowy cold day. i dont know. the price was a little high for something like this, but i just really wanted a boot that wasnt so stiff and hard to walk in for my son.my son wears a size 9.5/10 and we got a 10.5 boot. it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: Cute but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. They were unfortunately too small. I also felt that they weren't sturdy enough for the kind of winters usually had in the north east. They were very easy for my son to walk in but harder to get on than I had anticipated. Partly by they were a bit snug. A bit overpriced as well considering they are water "resistant" not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My little one has tiny feet for her age and I've had a terrible time finding winter boots to fit her. I ordered half a size bigger than she wears and sneakers and they will be perfect for winter! The Stride Rite boots are wonderful they fit just like her sneakers and are easy on easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great for little guy who loves to play outside
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo son is very petite and I've been struggling to find him something for winter to play in. These seem to be perfect so far very lightweight. We just walked around in the woods and he had no trouble walking and running! They seem pretty water resident but I wouldnt suggest jumping directly into a puddle. I think they'd be ok in the snow to, I'd say appropriate for a mild to moderate winter but nothing to crazy
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with these boots/sneakers and my toddler likes them because ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these boots/sneakers and my toddler likes them because of the character printed on them. The only con to these shoes are the difficulty with putting them on, both my husband and I struggled. Other than that, they did what they were supposed to do, protected our daughters feet and lower legs from snow and cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: but in general we love Stride rite and I LOVE these boots for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Our first pair came with two different sized shoes! Weird...but in general we love Stride rite and I LOVE these boots for the winter on my preschooler. Much easier for him to manuver in and play around in the snow. Since he inevitably will wear them even when we aren't playing in the snow these are great for just regular stomping in puddles as well. They keep snow out with the top and its easy to squeeze pant legs inside if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J Boss

customer_reviews.title: I wish that, they could have it as a sneakers , but warm inside
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, but my baby doesn’t like it to wear. Because it’s tall and little hard to wear sometime. She gets scared and doesn’t want them . I wish they could have it not that tall, but same below.
customer_reviews.author: Zhamilia

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small but great for snow play
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping out snow when playing in snow. We find them to be slippery inside on tile or laminate though so you want to take them right off. My 2 year old wears 5 in his tennis shoes but we had to order him 6.5 Wide in these. Luckily Amazon allows for free returning and shipping since it took a few tries to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would give these boots zero stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are AWFUL. The fit is absolutely off, and they are ridiculously difficult to get into my 18 month old's foot. I'm so frustrated that we spent this much on such awful boots. They don't seem comfortable for my daughter, and often her heels pop out of the back, even though size wise the "fit." It took us 10 minutes to put these on yesterday. Don't waste your money on these. I wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for new walkers
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids who are just learning to walk instead of big boots since those are more difficult for recent walkers to walk in. We didn't have issues with them not being waterproof, however, we didn't stomp around in tons of water or anything since our daughter mostly walked the driveway and low snow areas since she was just starting to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe but too small
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the sneaker/boot and thought this shoe looked gorgeous. Unfortunately I had to return it because I ordered my 15 month old's exact shoe size and was unable to get it on his foot. I will reorder it but a size larger. Hopefully that works for him so he has boots ready for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very good boot
customer_reviews.text: Kids loves them, definitely easier to get on than imagined. Good stride rite quality, looks cool too. Can't really attest yo waterproof or not. Were a little damp inside after first use, but can't say if that was due to boot not being waterproof or snow getting in from top of cuff. Would buy again though, kids (both 1 year old and 4 year old) walked and moved much more naturally than the typical gargantuan snow boot allows.
customer_reviews.author: Grandeson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: I love Stride Rite and have bought severals shoes for my LO. However this winter boot dissapoint me. I couldnt vet my 16month old foot in the shoe. Going to return them and stick to the Carter ones i got.
customer_reviews.author: pricilla fung

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great, my son has Down syndrome and is a ...
customer_reviews.text: These were extremely difficult to get on my child. The concept is great, my son has Down syndrome and is a little clumsy when walking. We needed a snow boot that wouldn't be too bulky but would also provide great support as he doesn't wear any kind of inserts. I love the style but like I said, putting it on him is a HUGE pain and he could easily remove them while we were in the car (he's 3). I only used them once or twice this winter.
customer_reviews.author: April Horne

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were warmer. Good if they won’t be out in the snow for more than 30 minutes. Not much warmer than tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Happy-ish
customer_reviews.text: Update* I had previously given this product a 5 star rating. I took it down to a 3 star rating because as its gotten wet outside from melting snow, my daughter's feet have gotten wet also. The boot is still very easy to walk and run in, and very cute. But not really waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Juhas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after finding my son had grown out of his previous pair. They are easy to get on and my son loves wearing them when he doesn't like anything I put on him. Lol. Highly recommend and quality is second to none
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Yay Snoots!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect kid's snow sneaker. It's a Stride-Rite sneaker that can't get cold & wet. Bam! Perfect product! If you didn't already know, Stride Rite has some of the best fitting, best made & most reasonably priced young children's sneakers. If you're in a high-quality kid's shoe store they're definitely showing you a few pair of Stride-Rites.
customer_reviews.author: Danrogy

customer_reviews.title: will fit hopefully better next year
customer_reviews.text: My son has only wore these once. I ordered a size and a half larger because I read the reviews they run small, I didn't find they ran big. So they are too big for him, will fit hopefully better next year. He wore them even though they are too big and his (4 year old) review is that he likes them because he can still run. I have experienced a 1 year old wearing these and they are great, usually it is to hard for a 1 year old to talk in boots, they are easy to walk in and they fold down to make it even easier when there isn't a lot of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Laflamme

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable! Great boots for active kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my 15 month old daughter. She wears a size 5 in Sketchers sneakers so I purchased these boots in a 5.5 and they fit perfect with just enough room for a thick pair of socks. They kept her feet warm when we went out to play in the snow. My daughter is a very active little girl and she was able to climb and play comfortably. I'm very happy with my purchase and would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shoe ever!! It is too tight at the ankle and everytime I had to put it on my three year old boy, we both thought we would break his ankle...I read the reviews about having a strategy to put it on but it was way too hard!! Such a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fit good. I wish like others mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fit good. I wish like others mentioned, though, they'd make the velcro adjustment straps a little longer (male side that has the hooks) because you can't really strap them anywhere near tight. UPDATE 1/11/17: Took these out for several hours of snow play. My son's feet were nice and warm and dry! No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Easy on /off.
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old says they are comfy and warm. Has worn them to play in the snow a number of times and his feet are warm and dry when we get back inside. Easy for him to put on and off. Easy for me to slide over pant bottom to keep snow out. He has skinny legs and feet so i wish the velcro would be allow us to tighten a bit more snug, but it hasnt been an issue so i guess its just a preference.
customer_reviews.author: Vallerii

customer_reviews.title: They're so difficult to get on my kiddo's feet. ...
customer_reviews.text: They're so difficult to get on my kiddo's feet. They're effective, and seemingly waterproof, but it's definitely almost not worth the effort it takes to get a squirmy toddler foot into.
customer_reviews.author: WKJones

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough good things about these boots
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about these boots. These are really the best winter boots for a toddler. She hasn't actually worn them yet because its August but she had a pair last year and I will keep buying them until we can no longer find them in her size. Revised march 20th, 2017 I am disappointed that the sole is separating after 3.5 months of use and we have several pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: They are more like a coated tennis shoe with a water resistant cover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter reported that while these are not the ultra waterproof "snow boots" she expected. They are more like a coated tennis shoe with a water resistant cover. But she said that she liked them more because the shoe part was more like a tennis shoe, her daughter had more mobility and comfort yet still the protection from the snow. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: CateW

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, warm, cute, not too difficult to put on toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these boots! She always wanted to wear them so she could stomp in puddles or the snow. Come next winter I'll probably buy her the same ones!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get pass the ankle
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to put the shoes on my toddler. The ankle is too narrow. It would have been easier if there was a zipper that goes all the way down or if there was a way to widen the ankle and then tighten afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: cctb07

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing! I am sad I didn't find these last ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! I am sad I didn't find these last year. They seem like they will be comfortable and still provide protection from the snow. My son is in a size 3-4 right now so I ordered a 5 and it seems like it will only fit for half the winter so I would order a size up. I will be ordering another pair for my daughter as well!
customer_reviews.author: SaraB

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments from random people as well.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Convenient and adorable! I struggled to get them on at first (not because the little missy wasn't wanting to wear them. She was trying to get them on for fun...) but they just slide on now once i started having her sit on my lap so i could pull them instead of push. :-) And we get lots of compliments and asked if they're shoes or boots and where we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever, they are warm (baby's feet sweat a little). The soles do not bend too much, but flexible enough for 10 mos old to walk and i feel that they are supposed to be a little higher and tougher to withstand bad weather. I am not sure if they are waterproof, but i am planning on using waterproof spray anyway. I will also try to wear warmer socks at winter time
customer_reviews.author: Aipery

customer_reviews.title: She is a relitiveely new walker and wanted something she could run in like sneakers. These were great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for winter boots. She is a relitiveely new walker and wanted something she could run in like sneakers. These were great. She loves them, they were very difficult to get on at first but the more I put them on the easier it is. She can wear them all day. They fit great right to size maybe even a little bigger. Would definately buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great toddler snow boot. They are a gorgeous blue and they kept his feet warm and dry. They are a little challenging to get on, but they stayed on his foot as a result. Just make sure to really loosen all straps as others have noted. Also, rolling down the top allowed us to pull them in better.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: brrr....cold feet.
customer_reviews.text: so, I really love these boots. So easy to put on and seem very comfortable for school. But definitely not a snow boot. My girls feet were freezing after 45 minutes in the snow. ...maybe perfect for a quick recess, but not for sledding. pretty pricy if its not going to meet my expectations of a snow boot. I bought them because I thought was getting both and snow both and comfort. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Twincess Mom

customer_reviews.title: great boots wish they were longer
customer_reviews.text: great product i just wish it had been a little longer up the leg. it hits my son at about low shin area. hes 2, 110cm tall.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N. Bone

customer_reviews.title: they seem to keep fall down which is fine if their snow pants are over them
customer_reviews.text: I wish these boots were a bit longer, they seem to keep fall down which is fine if their snow pants are over them. The traction is great and my son loves them. The star wars picture is pretty dark, but you can still see it. Easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these boots. They are true to size and are just as they are pictured. We like how you can tuck the bottom of the pants into them for added protection from the snow. They stay on very well with the two different Velcro straps. We will probably order these again next winter in her new size.
customer_reviews.author: ZoHoDo

customer_reviews.title: Best light boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Looks nice. very light. keeps my kid's feet dry and warm. Feels like wearing sneakers! We love it! Once again Stride Rite did it! their shoes are so comfy and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: K. shen

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great. Easy to put in
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Easy to put in, easy to walk in and her feet stayed warm and dry in the snow. Please know these are not rain boots. She walked thru a puddle in the garage from melted snow and they did get wet.
customer_reviews.author: gary grant

customer_reviews.title: Remembering Stride Rite
customer_reviews.text: Like the sneaker of this boot, and name brand Stride Rite an older name I didn't know they still made children's foot wear. Thought this boot was a stand up to calf. Turned out to be a slouchy style.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. I love it and so does my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I love it and so does my daughter she can wear them for long periods of time with no complaints. easy to get on. great for snow. only with the velcro straps were shorter or there was some option for laces. after a few uses the length of the velcro was a little long and started curling.but great shoe and soooooo much better than other boots ive seen for toddlers. would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little boots!
customer_reviews.text: these boots are awesome! They fit like they should. They look like sneakers but have the extra leg to help protect little legs from cold and snow. I especially like the stretch velcroed strap across the ankle to snug in the little foot, but there is on also along the top of the leg to secure it above the calf. Looks great. Functions great!
customer_reviews.author: Erick Dee

customer_reviews.title: Warm for casual wear.  Not superb for snow play.
customer_reviews.text: The closure isn't very good or secure: Velcro only, and not able to be pulled tight enough. And, due to these being a soft, not rigid upper, they kept falling down during play in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: G M

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for my son for the winter
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews of my peers, I made the conscious decision to size up. I'm very grateful that I did so. These were perfect for my son for the winter. (Not to mention the colors are adorable and perfectly matched his North Face bunting). These were perfect for winter last year, so perfect that I am going to order a second pair for this winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for little ones
customer_reviews.text: This allows my 1 year old with large feet to walk in the snow. Other boots are too stiff at the top and he falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Erika T

customer_reviews.title: Too small, maybe try one size up
customer_reviews.text: His stride rite sneakers in the same size fit well but these are difficult to get on him.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Fits perfect. Because of the Velcro straps they stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots!!! They fit 1 size smaller than normal shoes though. I had to return mine. I bought another pair directly from Stride Rite but definitely would have bought these in a size up from Amazon if they were in stock!!! Not clunky like kids boots can be!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: but fit fine with regular socks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's feet were a little wet by the end of the snow play, but all in all they fit really well and no complaints from her! They were a bit challenging to get on with thick warm socks, but fit fine with regular socks.
customer_reviews.author: mommy_of_2

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these and I love them! They are super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and I love them! They are super cute, easy to get on and easy to clean. My daughter visited her grandparents in Michigan recently and I packed these for her. They worked amazingly for playing in the snow or just playing outside on a colder day!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Castelli

customer_reviews.title: No waterproof, no for snow
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this boot thinking that it would be an excellent choice for rainy and snow weather. Unfortunately, this boot are NOT waterproof. I am just wondering if the brand is authentic or not.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get on!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fit well, keep feet dry. Very difficult to put on! It is impossible for my parents to get them on his feet when they watch him. I wish they had a zipper down the side to help get them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: APC

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4 year old grandchild and and she loves them! She wore them about an hour the first day and has been wearing them all day ever since. She says they feel good and don't hurt her feet. I like them folded down to put on easily but she likes them up so once they're on, she puts them the way she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: romansjoy

customer_reviews.title: The kids like them too
customer_reviews.text: Walking in snow they are nice and not cumbersome very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying a 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. My toddler loves wearing it. I like that it's water proof so it can be used as rain boots too, comes in wide sizes, can be worn 2 ways by folding the sides or pulling ut up all the way, machine washable, and packable cause it's not like those other stiff-soled shoes. Will be getting 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: CVmom

customer_reviews.title: Winter - Spring life saver!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My daughter doesn't even like wearing her tennis shoes anymore with the nicer weather. She must wear her shoe/boots! They fit her feet perfectly (though I ordered big so they last for next winter). The price was reasonable and the construction is what I have grown to expect from Stride Rite! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Walter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old loves them. I got a size big to fit extra socks . They fit perfect and seem to be comfortable for her because she only wants to wear these boots now . They keep her feet warm and dry in the snow but don't seem to make her feet overly hot. I've gotten no complaints from my child .
customer_reviews.author: TinyTimeBomb

customer_reviews.title: worst boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these boots. Technically they fit but they are impossible to get on. I tried for 20 minutes and i could only get one of the boots on. I gave up and decided to return these boots. I hate these boots and I hope no one buys them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Guarino

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: We get a lot of snow and these were perfect for my 2 year old. They kept him warm and dry and are so easy to get on and off. He could walk so easy in these. No slipping like other boots. He wears them alot when it's not snowing.
customer_reviews.author: TexasBecks

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. They seem nice, though we haven't been able to get out too much to use them. They are still a bit difficult to get on, but many shoes are when you are dressing a young toddler. They do keep his feet dry and relatively warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small but good quality
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is a great boot but it was way too small. I ordered one size larger than his shoe size and I still couldn't get my sons feet into them so I had to return them. I might buy again but would rather fit them before buying. I would recommend getting at least 2 sizes larger than current shoe size and maybe even a wide.You can always put two pairs of socks on if they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic winter boot! Go up 2 sizes from your child's regular shoe size to get the proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: The best snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these snow boots. Easy to put on, warm, waterproof. I love it how flexible the upper part of the boot is, it doesn’t constraint kid’s motions
customer_reviews.author: Daria Shulishova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my son since he has wide feet, and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: It's Shelle

customer_reviews.title: Best little boots out there!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best toddler snow boots out there. They slip on easy and wear like a shoe. My grandson can walk with no difficulty in them like he would with regular snow boots. The quality is as expected with stride rite and I'm so glad I chose these!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears Stride Rite tennis shoes and we ordered the boots a half size up than her current tennis shoes. They were impossible to get on her feet. My husband and I both tried as well as her teachers at daycare. I love Stride Rite but not these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her boots! She loved playing in the snow and when she finally came in her feet were warm and dry. I should have ordered one size up to layer socks.
customer_reviews.author: carlyp

customer_reviews.title: so it works for me due to the great price on Amazon (vs through Stride Rite)
customer_reviews.text: "Collar" doesn't stay up well, but it's a comfy sneaker boot my almost 5yo likes wearing, so it works for me due to the great price on Amazon (vs through Stride Rite). If it was MSRP, I don't know if I'd buy it.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Buying these every year
customer_reviews.text: The best. This is the second winter I've bought these for my daughter, and I'd buy them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cordts

customer_reviews.title: Very Rigid Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. Fit is good. The only problem is that this sneaker-boot is extremely difficult to get on a toddler. The sneaker is quite rigid and the Velcro opening does not allow enough room to help slide the foot into the sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: lalos

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the only boots I buy for my daughter. They are so easy to get on and off, fit more like a shoe than a boot and are completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved these Snoots last year and had to buy them a size up this year. I wish they made them in adult sizes! Very comfortable and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Princess mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight and cool!
customer_reviews.text: I spoke to my Grandson who received them from me. He was impressed with the lightness of them. When kids have to put on and take off their boots for recess, they want them to be easy. But when they are on recess they don't want to feel like the boots are two cement blocks. These boots are the greatest on all accounts.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fit well
customer_reviews.text: fit great and were relatively easy to get on. Almost every day, we got comments about them
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Tough to get on
customer_reviews.text: They are tough to get on and this distracts from the quality of the fit and of the boot .
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are great quality and so nice in the aspect that he can maneuver so much easier than a bulky boot. It's not winter yet so I'm not sure about the warmth but they look and feel like they will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I would apply water proofing spray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I would apply water proofing spray, but these are perfect and can be like a sneaker or a boot. I've read other reviews stating that these are not water proof, but that's easy enough to fix and these have a few functions, so we love them. Great fit, too. LOVE that they have 1/2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieChi

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a hurry when my area was under a blizzard warning. I purchased a size 4 toddler. My daughter has small, thin feet, and at 17months old, can still fit a size 3 comfortably. I figured the size 4 boot may be a tad big, but nothing that an extra pair of socks couldn't solve. Not at all!! Fits just right! Other reviews I read before I purchased said to order a size up, and I now agree! From my experience, order a size bigger than your child's current size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This are just great. Bought a size larger only too have enough ...
customer_reviews.text: This are just great. Bought a size larger only too have enough room for a nice sock. Doesnt get wet in the snow and keeps my daughter warm. Very comfy on her and easy to put on and take off. She has a narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks. Haven't tried these in the rain or snow. That will be the true test.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Good marketing, not so easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: After watching a commercial for these particular Stride Rite boots, I was very disappointed to find out that they are incredibly hard to put on just as any other snowboots, unlike what their advertisement says. My son only wear stride rite due to his wide feet, however these did seem to run small
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: they are flexible and this is great for a toddler who likes to run
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kid for the second winter in a row. They are not entirely waterproof and his feet are sometimes cold when he returns from walks. However, they are flexible and this is great for a toddler who likes to run, climb, and go for extended walks in the snow. I had previously bought him more rigid Sorel boots and those made it too difficult for him to walk.
customer_reviews.author: nina9

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent and my kids wear these all the time
customer_reviews.text: Stride Rite is one of those companies where you get what you pay for! The quality is excellent and my kids wear these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: A Tice

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get them on
customer_reviews.text: The size of the shoe itself was fine, but I couldn't get my toddler's foot down in the boot. I ended up getting another pair of boots that zip up the side and were much easier to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! They wear like sneakers. Bought for my 3 year old and 1.5 year old. Easy enough to get on - the top can be rolled down to help guide the foot into the shoe. I was surprised how easily my 1.5 year old could walk around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith W

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Made2Play Toddler and Little Boys Snow Boot
product_meta.description:
Washable materials for easy cleaning * Mesh linings with antimicrobial treatment for comfort and breathability * Finemold strap end details for easy grip * Toe wrap for added durability * * care instructions: machine wash and airdry *

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: Water-resistant winter boot featuring foldover shaft and reinforced toe/heel counter
Bungee lacing with dual hook-and-loop straps
Fleece lining with antimicrobial treatment to reduce odor
